> <OLD>
>
> Tucson still holds his ground, despite the dinosaur's charge.  As they near
> him, he rears up, extends his enormous wings and beats them with powerful
> thrusts, hoping to create enough wind resistance to keep them at bay.  His
> tail whips around in powerful coils as he prepares to catch one of them with
> a constrictor grip, in an attempt to slow them down.   He sees something
> very familiar about them, yet having had a portion of his memory erased when
> Cyclonus struck him vorns ago, he could not really be sure he was seeing who
> he thought he was seeing.  His expression changes, as anger is replaced by
> confusion and anticipation.
>
> " Grimlock?  Wait!  Is your name Grimlock?"
>
> Tucson shows the leader his Maximal faction symbol, and a small Autobot
> symbol located on his left front haunch.
>
> " I am Tucson Prime, formally Tucson!  You might have known me in my Autobot
> alt form!  But I assure you that I'm not lying!   I once worked for Optimus
> Prime!  "
>
> He hoped that Grimlock would sort of remember who he was.  He then takes a
> submissive stance, showing that he means no harm.

<NEW>

As TUSCON takes a submissive stance GRIMLOCK assumed his robot mode,
his rather large and imposing looking rifle with twin cannons on it
now pointed directly at TUSCON. There seemed to be little or no other
reaction to TUSCON's words.

GRIMLOCK was still massive and imposing as a robot, every bit as tall
and thick as he had been pictured in the histories even though he had
been part of the great reduction as every other Autobot who had
survived since then. However instead of their being an Autobot patch
on his chest there was a blank spot where it looked as if something
used to be there but had been cut off.

"Cuffs!" GRIMLOCK barked.

There was a grunt as one of the transmetal dinosaurs, the Triceratops
SLAG, transformed into robot mode, "No! Me want to smash!" He
displayed his desire physcially as he oriented his electron blaster on
TUSCON.

The other two transmetal Dinosaurs presumably SNARL and SLUDGE just
grumbled, SLUDGE stepping foward, his stomp causing the trees to shake
and rattle.

"Me said cuffs!" GRIMLOCK said as he turned to look at SLAG.

SLAG turned to look at GRIMLOCK as if he were about to say something
else and instead met GRIMLOCK's optics and remorceless stare. After a
moment he nodded, "Cuffs."

Turning back to TUSCON the dino pulled out what were obviously stassis
cuffs and was about to place them on the submissive TUSCON as the
other dinosaurs grinned from beastmode.

GRIMLOCK merely looked on sternly, still having his laser rifle
pointed at TUSCON.

(TAG)

Preston
